cell.color: The discovery kiosk offers fascinating information about animals and the environment to amuse and educate your adult guests. A guest's educational donations temporarily increase after viewing the discovery kiosk.
Children love to jump and bounce in the tropical bounce house! This large, inflatable structure is big enough for four children to play in at once.

The conservation breeding center is a specialized research facility devoted to breeding endangered and critically endangered species. Having a conservation breeding center makes it easier to breed all endangered and critically endangered species in your zoo.
To unlock the conservation breeding center, you must complete the Endangered Species campaign.

Your young guests will love the face painting kiosk, where they can be made up as tigers, pandas, and other animals.
To make the face painting kiosk available in your game, you must win the Entertainment Donation Achievement Award.

Guests enjoy wearing the headset provided by the headset kiosk. The wireless headphone sets provide your guests with additional information about the animals in your zoo.
To make the headset kiosk available in your game, you must win the Educational Donation Award.

The photo kiosk allows your guests to enjoy all the zoo photos you've taken.
To make the photo kiosk available in your game, you must win the Endangered Species Photographer Award.

The sky tower provides your guests with a magnificent view of your entire zoo.
To make the sky tower available in your game, you must win the Tour Rating Achievement Award.
